__e: Not one person who would have betrayed him. Except the one he gave his love to.
In all your life, you never screwed around.
But more important, you have betrayed yourself.
A few minutes ago, you betrayed him and now...
The one woman who handed you double-cross for double-cross right up to the end.
The professor betrayed us, and wants to kill us all.
Very well, then. The name of the man who betrayed my son.
Suppose you tell me who betrayed my son, Major?
In any case, I shall have the pleasure of bringing the colonel face to face with a son who betrayed his Empire.
You tell me he betrayed his country.
This case goes far beyond the fate of one man... who betrayed his own command.
And so, she cheated only once?
The Chief said she had sex with him!
Why did she betray you with me?
Why didn't he rat on you too?
The professor has betrayed you for his own sake.
